xuiMenuLink
directive in module xui

Description

XUI wrapper for menu link. It is used as hypertext link. It can be used only inside xuiMenu directive.

Usage

as element:
<xui-menu-link
       url="{string}"
       target="{string}"
       is-disabled="{boolean}">
</xui-menu-link>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
urlstring

Value to be used as hypertext link url.

targetstring

Value to be used as link target attribute.

is-disabledboolean

Expression to determine if menu item should be disabled.

Example
